title: Take Your Seat
itunes:title: Take Your Seat
description:
There is a seat of rest that has your name on it, and it’s time for you to rest. Enter into God’s rest! As you learn to live from a place of rest, you will enjoy your life more and experience greater peace and power!Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
